Motion filed by Plaintiff Alane Taratuska for Stay of Collection Actions with certificate of service. (Oney, Walter) (Entered: 12/29/2005)

Motion with certificate of service filed by Plaintiff Alane Taratuska For Expedited Hearing on 13 Motion filed by Plaintiff Alane Taratuska for Stay of Collection Actions. (Oney, Walter) (Entered: 12/29/2005)

Endorsed Order dated 12/30/2005 Granting 14 Motion filed by Plaintiff Alane Taratuska For Expedited Hearing on 13 Motion for Stay of Collection Actions. ALLOWED. THE COURT WILL HOLD A HEARING ON JANUARY 5, 2006 AT 9:45 AM. ANY RESPONSE TO THE MOTION TO STAY COLLECTION ACTIONS SHALL BE FILED BY JANUARY 5, 2006 AT 12:00 NOON. THE PLAINTIFF SHALL GIVE NOTICE AND FILE A CERTIFICATE OF SUCH SERVICE. (ymw, ) (Entered: 12/30/2005)
Certificate of Service of Notice of Hearing Re: 13 Motion for Stay of Collection Actions. (Oney, Walter) (Entered: 12/30/2005)
BNC Certificate of Mailing - PDF Document. RE: 15 Order on Motion For Emergency/Expedited Hearing, Service Date 01/01/2006. (Admin.) (Entered: 01/02/2006)
Somma, J. Order dated 1/5/06 Re: 13 Motion filed by Plaintiff Alane Taratuska for Stay of Collection Actions. HEARING HELD. MOTION IS GRANTED. SEE SEPARATE ORDER. (ymw, ) (Entered: 01/06/2006)

Somma, J. Order dated 1/5/2006 Granting 13 Motion filed by Plaintiff Alane Taratuska for Stay Pendente Lite. IT IS HEREBY ORDERED THAT THE DEFENDANTS IN THIS PROCEEDING, AND THEIR OFFICERS, AGENTS, SERVANTS, EMPLOYEES AND ATTORNEYS, AND ANY ASSIGNEE OR TRANSFEREE FROM A DEFENDANT, AND EACH OF THEM, ARE HEREBY ENJOINED FOR THE DURATION OF THIS PROCEEDING, OR UNTIL THE FURTHER ORDER OF THIS COURT, FROM COMMENCING OR CONTINUING ANY ACTION TO COLLECT OR ENFORCE THE STUDENT LOAN CLAIMS. (ymw, ) (Entered: 01/06/2006)
BNC Certificate of Mailing - PDF Document. RE: 18 Order Service Date 01/08/2006. (Admin.) (Entered: 01/09/2006)
